creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Properties file are in ascii by default.
Use native2ascii java utility on your file or an online converter for this property.

http://native2ascii.net/
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/technotes/tools/windows/native2ascii.html
